com.ireasoning.protocol.snmp
Class SnmpIpAddress

java.lang.Object
  com.ireasoning.protocol.snmp.SnmpOctetString
      com.ireasoning.protocol.snmp.SnmpIpAddress
All Implemented Interfaces:
Msg, SnmpDataType, java.io.Serializable
public class SnmpIpAddress
extends SnmpOctetString

This class represents Snmp IpAddress data type. The IpAddress type represents a 32-bit internet address. It is represented as an OCTET STRING of length 4, in network byte-order.

See Also:
Serialized Form

SnmpIpAddress

public SnmpIpAddress(java.lang.String ipAddr)
Constructs an SnmpIpAddress with the passed in ipAddr object. If passed ipAddr is null or an empty string, this class will represent it as 0.0.0.0

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - raised if passed ipAddr is invalid

SnmpIpAddress

public SnmpIpAddress(java.net.InetAddress ipAddr)
Constructs an SnmpIpAddress with the passed in ipAddr object. If passed ipAddr is null or an empty string, this class will represent it as 0.0.0.0

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - raised if passed ipAddr is invalid
